refnamediv.refpurpose: Return the PHP loader or bootstrap stub of a Phar archive

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
public stringPhar::getStub
Phar archives contain a bootstrap loader, or stub written in PHP that is executed when the archive is executed in PHP either via include:
<?php include 'myphar.phar'; ?>
or by simple execution:
php myphar.phar
